item.title: Need help coding vls and stat hammer spec
item.dc:creator: @Burkey Burkey
item.description:
@Burkey wrote:

You can always just copy one of the working specs, such as the AGS spec, tweak two or three gfx/emote IDs, change the misc.random(XX)

That above always works just fine.

Assuming youâ€™re on a Delta Base, you must go to special.java and add the IDs of these weapons to the two long lists at the top of the file.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help coding vls and stat hammer spec
